name: D4-Liverty (Futuregames)
description:
Delivery has crashed into a great tree, and is now stranded by an island. He has some very important letters to deliver. He needs to make sure to find his lost solar air plane to get back to work.

This build version was turned in as an assignment for Future Games Game Project 1 2022. Check the link bellow for an improved version with additional minor changes and fixes.

Controls:
Move: WASD (Keyboard), Left Stick (Controller)

Jump: SPACE (Keyboard), A (Xbox Controller), X (Playstation Controler), B (Switch Controler)

Hover (Toggle): Press the jump button again to hover. Press Jump button again to disable hover.

Also a special THANK YOU to Andrew Allen for being the Narrator in our game!
